page.title: 19Customers
page.content: People in our area make full use of their local shops. There are large numbers of elderly people in the locality and convenience is important to them. Many people are willing to pay more in the corner shop for the sake of convenience. There are many shops in the neighbourhood selling things such as milk, bread, tobacco and sweets. Items like these are often bought on the spur of the moment and people are not willing to go far for these things. There are some shoppers, however, who prefer the greater choice and cheaper prices that the supermarket can offer. Car-owning shoppers would be more likely to visit superstores where they could do a whole week's shopping in one trip.
